title: HARVESTING Okra in MY GARDEN || How to Harvest Okra  @farmguards

tasks.task: Harvesting okra in a mixed cropping system
subtasks: Identify okra plants among mixed crops (corn, cassava)
Use a knife to cut okra fruits rather than manual hand cutting
Check multiple okra plants for ripe fruits
Recognize signs of okra ripeness (fresh, soft, suitable for eating)
Understand management of overripe okra for seed preservation
Consider harvesting timing for consumption vs. seed preservation
